caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. LASHAWN HUGHES, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.

opinion.posture: No. 288 WAL 2002, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 18th day of September, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
